text: I noticed this is a similar appeal to the one Matt Mullenweg makes on behalf of WordPress, something I care about, and now have invested in and would defend if I felt someone was trying to undermine it. Maybe we can find the theory under each of our concerns so we can help each other when our efforts are under attack. The tech industry is often very predatory, I think we should help each other. That's what I was writing about yesterday. Maybe think of it as the NATO of tech. :-)
